main event: Three elongated reddish objects were observed traveling at high speeds in a zigzag motion, with speeds reported up to 7000 mph.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 3 minutes,The radar operator believed the objects were piloted devices,There were similar military sightings that showed radar blips at high speeds,The objects were described as elongated and reddish in color,The case was ultimately evaluated as unidentified.
witness description: Major T. Tech Sgt Archibald Hiller, Staff Sgt Joseph Willis, and MN 2 Class Anthony Felella, all radar operators.
